# Departing Australia Superannuation Payment and Early tax returns
Hassle-free early tax return and superannuation refund services. Maximise your financial benefits as you bid farewell to Australia. Let our experts handle your tax obligations and ensure a smooth departure. Contact us now!

Book appointment
Book your appointment
One of our accountants will solve your questions
100% guaranteed professional service

## We can help you with your DASP (Departing Australia Superannuation Payment) and your Early Tax return
1
### Book your appointment
Start the process by booking an appointment with ease, choosing your preferred mode of communication: face-to-face, video call, or phone call.

2
### Comprehensive Information Check
During the scheduled appointment, our dedicated professionals will conduct a thorough check of your information. Whether it's a face-to-face meeting, a video call, or a phone call, we will ensure accuracy by verifying your details with the Australian Taxation Office (ATO) and your superfund. Our knowledgeable team will also explain the processes involved in both tax return and superannuation refund, addressing any questions or concerns you may have.

3
### Receive a quote for the service
Following the information check, we will provide you with a detailed quote for our services. Regardless of the chosen mode of communication, our quote will encompass the specific requirements of your tax return and superannuation refund, tailored to your unique circumstances. Rest assured that our pricing remains competitive, while upholding the highest standards of professionalism and efficiency.

## Frequently asked questions
Early Tax return
¿How long does the Tax Return process takes?
Electronic tax returns are usually processed by the ATO within two weeks. We expect that most refunds will be out within 10 working days after lodgement of your tax return, but some people will wait a bit longer for the ATO to get it done.
Who is eligible for an early tax return?
To be eligible for an early tax return, you must meet the following criteria:
